basics.name: Snaider Armando Rangel Rondon
basics.label: Full Stack Engineer | Intelligent Systems & AI Automation | Scalable Cloud Solutions
basics.summary: Full Stack Engineer specialized in building intelligent and scalable systems that transform business operations. I design end-to-end solutions that convert manual processes into AI-driven automated workflows, leveraging modern architectures and cloud computing environments. My work focuses on operational efficiency, database optimization, and intelligent service integration to deliver measurable impact in productivity and performance.

work.name: Lynxus Solutions
work.summary: Orchestrated the development and implementation of technology solutions aimed at optimizing critical business processes. Contributed to document workflow automation through intelligent extraction and classification systems, reducing manual intervention and improving operational accuracy. Developed absence management modules and key QMS functionalities to enhance traceability, efficiency, and quality standards.
highlights: Integrated AI-powered automation into business workflows
Optimized databases for performance and scalability

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Specialized in frontend development focused on user experience and functional design. Worked directly with clients to deliver intuitive, visually engaging interfaces aligned with business objectives. Strengthened expertise in UI/UX principles, performance optimization, and user-centered digital solutions.
highlights: Translated business needs into digital experiences
Improved usability and performance of web solutions
